_description: Configuration for badges-ts. Place this file in your project root as badges-ts.json to customize generated badges.
kit.required.code.coverage.description: Minimum coverage percentage required to pass the gate. This value is used to determine badge colors based on coverage levels.
kit.badges.folder.description: Relative path to the folder where badges-ts will write generated badge files.
kit.0.percent.color.description: Color used for 0% (or very low) values. Accepts any valid badge color string (e.g. 'red', '#ff0000').
kit.above.70.percent.color.description: Color for values strictly above 70% and up to 80%, if a more specific rule is not matched.
kit.above.60.percent.color.description: Color for values strictly above 60% and up to 70%, if a more specific rule is not matched.
kit.below.60.percent.color.description: Color for values below or equal to 60%.
